column1: it is seen in papers that more cases of swine flue r being reported in jaipur.is it safe to travel to jaipur and ajmer 0n 15 & 16 february with my wife ? we are both above 65.
its not yet an epidemic- its safe to travel
DEAR Some cases of swine flu were reported but it is well under control & very safe to travel to jaipur , ajmer .
